mapper.select:
select t.* from( SELECT t.*, t2.username tousername, t3.username createusername, t4.name orgname FROM cms_work_goal t left join sys_user t2 on t.touser=t2.usercode left join sys_user t3 on t.createuser=t3.usercode left join sys_org t4 on t4.id=t3.orgid where 1=1 and t.goalno=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm')
and t.touser in (select usercode from sys_user where orgid in(select id from ggs.sys_org t start with t.id=#{orgid} connect by prior t.id=t.pid) )
order by t.PRIORITY )t where rownum<=5
select * from ( select * from cms_log t where t.objid=#{id} and t.objtype='workgoal' order by t.SYSOPERTIME desc)where rownum<=20
